dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- SQL
dmca.body:
October 22, 2006

Google, Inc. 
ATTN: Blogger Legal Support,
DCMA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: Copyright Infringement

To Whom It May Concern: 

Good morning. I contacted Google Blogger Help on 10.09.2006 concerning copyright infringement on www.blogger.com. I received a response to my request to remove copy written content on www.blogger.com that is owned by www.mssqltips.com. This letter is in response to the email that was sent to have the content that is copyright infringed removed.

Copyright Overview

All web pages on www.MSSQLTIPS.com have a copyright statement, the www.MSSQLTIPS.com web site has a detailed copy right statement and all emails sent to subscribers have a copyright statement. See enclosures.

The www.MSSQLTIPS.com copyright indicates the following:

"The entire web site may not be reproduced in any form without written permission from Edgewood Solutions. Some individual articles are copyrighted by their respective authors and other content that has been used is referenced back to its original source on the internet. 
This content on this web site (ww.mssqltips.com) is for informational purposes only. Edgewood Solutions, LLC AND ITS RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS MAKE NO WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, ON THIS WEB SITE (www.mssqltips.com).

Complying with all applicable copyright laws is the responsibility of the user. Without limiting the rights under copyright, no part of this web site (www.mssqltips.com) may be reproduced, stored in or introduced into a retrieval system, or transmitted in any form or by any means (electronic, mechanical, photocopying, recording, or otherwise), or for any purpose, without the express written permission of Edgewood Solutions, LLC.

Edgewood Solutions, LLC may have patents, patent applications, trademarks, copyrights, or other intellectual property rights covering subject matter in this web site (w.mssqltips.com). Except as expressly provided in any written license agreement from Edgewood Solutions, LLC, the furnishing of this web site (www.mssqltips.com) does not give you any license to these patents, trademarks, copyrights, or other intellectual property.
